docs.text: Awesome AWS Workshops ¶ (Unofficial) Curated list of awesome workshops found around in the internet. As we all have been there, finding that workshop that you have just attended shouldn't be hard. The idea is to provide an easy central repository, in a collaborative way. As the list grows we'll start including the number of and follow any other ideas that you might have for it. Inspired by awesome-php . Warning As you go through each workshop, they might create billable AWS resources. You should remove those at the end of the workshop to avoid incurring future charges to your account. Follow each workshop instrutions to do so. Awesome AWS Workshops AI and ML Alexa Application Modernization BlockChain Connect Containers Databases and Analytics Development and CI/CD Enterprise Customers Event Driven HPC Infrastructure as Code Infrastructure IoT Management Tools and Governance Media Microsoft Networking Security Serverless Storage AI and ML ¶ AI and Machine Learning related Workshops AI Workshop AI/ML Workshops Amazon SageMaker Autopilot Workshop Amazon SageMaker MLOps Amazon SageMaker Workshop Amazon Sumerian Workshop Amazon Textract Code Samples Amazon Textract Enhancer Analyze documents with Amazon Textract and generate output in multiple formats AWS AI Services Workshop Series AWS DeepComposer labs AWS DeepLens Workshop AWS High Level AI Services Workshop AWS RoboMaker Workshop Build, train, debug, deploy and monitor with SageMaker Getting started with Amazon SageMaker How to prevent misdiagnosis of breast diseases using Amazon SageMaker, Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth and AWS Step Functions: IoT/Greengrass/Analytics/Edge Machine Learning Data Lake Workshop Machine Learning with AWS Glue and Amazon SageMaker Lab: Build, Train, and Deploy a Text Classification Model Parse JSON response of Amazon Textract Realtime analytics for ride sharing Workshop SageMaker for Battlesnake AI SageMaker Workshop on steroids Voice Robotics Workshop Alexa ¶ Alexa is Amazon’s cloud-based voice service available on hundreds of millions of devices from Amazon and third-party device manufacturers. With Alexa, you can build natural voice experiences that offer customers a more intuitive way to interact with the technology they use every day. We offer a collection of tools, APIs, reference solutions, and documentation to make it easier to build for Alexa. Alexa - How to build Alexa Skills using AWS Services Alexa Enabled Smart Devices Workshop Application Modernization ¶ Build a Modern Web Applications on AWS, deploy a web application, connect to a database, and analyze user behavior Application Modernization Decloupled Microservices Modern Application Development Workshop Modern Application Development Workshop Modernization Workshops Mythical Mysfits BlockChain ¶ Amazon Managed Blockchain eliminates the heavy lifting involved in the setup of blockchain networks by reducing 60% of time taken in hosting Hyperledger Fabric frameworks. Amazon Managed Blockchain Workshop Connect ¶ Amazon Connect is an easy to use omnichannel cloud contact center that helps companies provide superior customer service at a lower cost. Over 10 years ago, Amazon’s retail business needed a contact center that would give our customers personal, dynamic, and natural experiences. We couldn’t find one that met our needs, so we built it. Amazon Connect Containers ¶ AWS is the #1 place for you to run containers and 80% of all containers in the cloud run on AWS. Customers choose to run their containers on AWS because of our security, reliability, and scalability. Amazon EKS and Kubernetes on EC2 Container Networking Workshop Amazon EKS workshop AWS App Mesh Workshop Blue Green Deployment with Amazon EKS and K8s Amazon ECS workshop for Fargate EKS/ECR/ECS Modernization GitOps Helm Workshop Integrating security into your container pipeline Introduction to GitOps on Amazon EKS with Weaveworks Kubernetes the AWSome Way Mythical Mysfits: A tale of love, loss, and cuddles Databases and Analytics ¶ Choose from 15 purpose-built database engines including relational, key-value, document, in-memory, graph, time series, and ledger databases. Advanced DynamoDB Design Patterns Lab Amazon Aurora Labs for MySQL Amazon Aurora Labs for MySQL Amazon Aurora Labs for PostgreSQL Amazon Dynamodb Labs Amazon Elasticsearch Workshops Amazon RDS Purpose Built Amazon Redshift Modernize DW Athena AWS Database Migration Workshop AWS IOT Analytics Workshop AWS Lake Formation Workshop Big Data Workshop Data Engineering 2.0 Data ingesting and processing workshop DMS Incremental Data Processing On Amazon EMR (apache Hudi) Migrating a SQL Server Database to Aurora (MySQL) PostgreSQL Training Realtime Analytics and Serverless DataLake Demos Redshift Immersion Day Serverless Data Lake Workshop Voice Powered Analytics Development and CI/CD ¶ Implement continuous integration and continuous delivery with the AWS Developer Tools to accelerate your software development and release cycle. Amazon CodeGuru An Introductory Workshop on CI/CD Practices AWS Code Suite Integration To Atlassian Jira Software Cloud Building Mobile Applications with React Native & AWS Amplify Building Serverless Web Applications with React and AWS Amplify CI/CD Serverless CDK CI/CD with Fargate CI/CD with Jenkins Continuous Deployment on AWS Workshop Operations in CI/CD Enterprise Customers ¶ AWS provides enterprises with multiple ways to consume services based on your business needs. SAP HANA on AWS Workshop Event Driven ¶ An event-driven architecture uses events to trigger and communicate between decoupled services and is common in modern applications built with microservices. Amazon MQ Workshop Amazon MSK Async Messaging Workshop HPC ¶ HPC on AWS removes the long wait times and lost productivity often associated with on-premises HPC clusters. Flexible configuration and virtually unlimited scalability allow you to grow and shrink your infrastructure as your workloads dictate, not the other way around. High Performance Computing on AWS ScaleOut Computing on AWS Infrastructure as Code ¶ Codifying your infrastructure allows you to treat your infrastructure as just code. You can author it with any code editor, check it into a version control system, and review the files with team members before deploying into production. AWS CDK Workshop AWS CloudFormation Best Practices: AWS CloudFormation Workshop for Partners AWS CloudFormation Workshop Infrastructure ¶ AWS offers a broad set of global cloud-based products including compute, storage, database, analytics, networking, machine learning and AI, mobile, developer tools, IoT, security, enterprise applications, and much more. Amazon Lightsail Workshop Build a migration factory with CloudEndure and Migration Hub Cloud Builders Day Core Services Customizing Content Delivery with Lambda@Edge EC2 Spot Instance workshop General Networking and Transit Gateway workshop Landing Zone Monte Carlo Simulation using AWS Batch Choose Your Own SAML Adventure IoT ¶ AWS has broad and deep IoT services, from the edge to the cloud. AWS IoT is the only cloud vendor to bring together data management and rich analytics in easy to use services designed for noisy IoT data. AWS IoT Analytics AWS IoT Full Workshop AWS IoT Greengrass Bootcamp Advanced AWS IoT Greengrass Bootcamp Starter AWS IoT SiteWise IoTAWS IoT Wind Energy Workshop Management Tools and Governance ¶ In the past, organizations have had to choose between innovating faster and maintaining control over cost, compliance, and security. With AWS Management and Governance services, customers don’t have to choose between innovation and control—they can have both. Amazon CloudWatch AWS Control Tower workshop AWS Service Catalog workshop AWS WellArchitected Labs Management Tools Immersion Day Open Distro for Elasticsearch AWS Systems Manager and AWS Config Media ¶ AWS brings highly scalable, elastic and secure cloud services to content production, storage, processing, and distribution. Setup Sports Event Video Live Streaming and Build an Instant Replay WebApp UnicornFlix Building a VideoonDemand App Using AWS Amplify and AWS Media Services UnicornTrivia Building a Live Trivia Mobile App Using AWS AppSync, AWS Amplify and AWS Media Services Microsoft ¶ Amazon Web Services offers a broad set of global compute, database, application, and deployment services that use Microsoft technologies or are designed to work with Microsoft technologies. Amazon FSx Workshop AWS .Net Developer Immersion Day AWS Database Migration Service SQL 2016 AWS for Microsoft Workloads Immersion Day AWS Windows Workshop Configuring a SQL Server Failover Cluster Instance with Storage Spaces Direct and EBS Creating a Sample RDS SQL Server DB Instance SQL 2008 Database Migration Service: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 to Aurora MySql Yet Another Database Migration Service Workshop, Microsoft SQL Server 2008 to Aurora MySql Deploying SQL Server to Linux HA Wordpress Workshop Launching SQL Server on EC2 Windows Win 2016 w/ SQL 2017 Launching SQL Server on RDS for SQL Server SQL 2017 Microsoft on AWS Development day site Microsoft SQL Server AlwaysOn on AWS EC2 - 2 node 2019 AG Microsoft SQL Server Modernization 2017 to Amazon Aurora Microsoft Workloads Immersion Day Migrate Windows SQL to Linux 2017 to Ubuntu Migrate Your First SQL Server Database to Amazon RDS for SQL Server 2014 to RDS Migrate Your First SQL Server Database to Amazon RDS for SQL Server using Backup/Restore 2008 to RDS Migrating (DMS) a SQL Server Database to Aurora (MySQL) 2008 to Aurora Migrating a SQL Server Database to SQL Server on Amazon EC2 2014 to EC2 MS-SQL Availability Group - Wind 2019 or Linux w/SQL 2017 STD + FSx witness MS-SQL Availability Group - Wind 2019 or Linux w/SQL 2017 STD + FSx witness Network ¶ AWS delivers the highest network availability of any cloud provider, with 3x fewer down time hours from networking issues than the next largest cloud provider. IPV6 Networking Workshop - Transit Gateway and Traffic Mirroring Security ¶ With AWS, you can improve your ability to meet core security and compliance requirements, such as data locality, protection, and confidentiality with our comprehensive services and features. AWS allows you to automate manual security tasks so you can shift your focus to scaling and innovating your business. Adding Security into DevOps AWS Identity: Using Amazon Cognito for serverless consumer apps AWS Protecting Workloads Workshops AWS Security Workshops ( MULTIPLE MODULES ) DevSecOps with Snyk Getting Hands on with Amazon GuardDuty IAM deep dive Scaling threat detection and response in AWS Securing Serverless Workloads Security Automation Serverless ¶ Serverless is the native architecture of the cloud that enables you to shift more of your operational responsibilities to AWS, increasing your agility and innovation. Alien Attack Amplify and React Amplify predictions workshop Auth and Authorization flows in IOS apps AWS JAM - Put Your Skills to the Test AWS SaaS Factory Monolith to Serverless SaaS Workshop: Build a serverless ride-sharing web application Building a modern application with CDK Chalice Python CI/CD and Serverless - Application Catalog CI/CD Serverless CDK CI/CD Serverless CloudFormation Collection of Serverless Workshops: Designing Cloud Native Microservices on AWS Event driven workshop Full stack serverless Amplify lab Innovator Island Learn to build fullstack Serverless apps Monolith to Microservices Workshop PhotoSharing Web App with AWS Amplify and AWS AppSync Serverless Atlas (many resources and information) Serverless image process workshop Step Functions Unicorn Flix: Using SAM CLI workshop Well Architected Storage ¶ AWS offers a complete range of services for you to store, access, govern, and analyze your data to reduce costs, increase agility, and accelerate innovation. Select from object storage, file storage, and block storage services, backup, and data migration options to build the foundation of your cloud IT environment. Amazon Elastic File System AWS Hybrid Storage Workshop AWS Backup Workshop Caching S3 with ElastiCache for Redis CloudEndure Deep Dive Data Migration (AWS Storage Gateway, AWS Snowball, and AWS DataSync) Data migration workshop, 10K small file scenario (S3 script, FGW, DataSync & Transfer SFTP) DataSync and File Gateway EFS Performance, Scaleout, Monitoring, Incloud Transfer FSx for Lustre FSx for Windows 90 minutes version for re:Invent 2019 FSx for Windows HPC handson FSx for Lustre Maximizing Storage Performance Online AWS Data Migrations S3 Security Settings and Controls Transfer for SFTP Logical Directory demonstration Contributing ¶ Your contributions are always welcome! Please take a look at the contribution guidelines first. We will keep pull requests open so you can vote for them by adding to it. Pull requests will be merged when their votes reach 10 . If you have any question about this opinionated list, do not hesitate to contact me @dgomesbr on Twitter or open an issue on GitHub.
